text: Hear the word that Yahweh speaks to you, \add O\add* house of Israel.
Thus says Yahweh:
“You must not learn the way of the nations,
and you must not be dismayed by the signs of the heavens,
for the nations are dismayed by them.
For the statutes of the peoples \add are\add* vanity,
for it \add is\add* a tree cut down from \add the\add* forest,
\add the\add* work of \add the\add* hands of a craftsman with the tool.
He decorates it with silver and gold,
they strengthen it with nails and hammers,
so that it does not stagger.
They \add are\add* like scarecrows\f + \fr 10:5 \ft Hebrew “scarecrow” \f* in a cucumber field,
they cannot speak.
Indeed, they must be carried,
for they cannot march.
You must not be afraid of them,
for they cannot do evil;
furthermore, to do good \add is\add* not in them.”
There is none like you, \add O\add* Yahweh,
you \add are\add* great and your name \add is\add* great in might.
Who would not revere you, O king of the nations?
For you it is fitting.
For among all the wise men of the nations,
and in all their kingdoms,\f + \fr 10:7 \ft Hebrew “kingdom” \f*
there is none like you.
⸤At the same time⸥\f + \fr 10:8 \ft Literally “And in one” \f* they are stupid and foolish,
\add in the\add* instruction of idols, it \add is\add* wood.
Silver beaten from Tarshish is brought,
and gold from Uphaz,
the work of \add the\add* craftsman and \add the\add* hands of the goldsmith.
Blue and purple \add are\add* their clothing,
all of them \add are\add* the work of skillful people.
But Yahweh \add is\add* the true God,
he \add is\add* the living God,
and ⸤an everlasting king⸥.\f + \fr 10:10 \ft Literally “a king of eternity” \f*
Because of his wrath the earth quakes,
and \add the\add* nations cannot endure his anger.
“⸤Thus⸥\f + \fr 10:11 \ft Literally “Like this” \f* you shall say to them,
‘Gods who did not make the heavens and the earth
will perish from the earth and from under these heavens.
\add He is\add* the maker of \add the\add* earth by his power,
\add who\add* created the world by his wisdom,
and by his understanding he stretched out heaven.
⸤When he utters his voice⸥\f + \fr 10:13 \ft Literally “At the voice of his giving” \f* \add there is\add* a noise of water in the heavens,
and he causes \add the\add* mist to rise from \add the\add* ends\f + \fr 10:13 \ft Hebrew “end” \f* of the earth.
He makes lightning for the rain,
and he causes \add the\add* wind to go out from his storehouses.
⸤Everyone⸥\f + \fr 10:14 \ft Literally “All humankind” \f* is stupid, ⸤without knowledge⸥,\f + \fr 10:14 \ft Literally “from knowledge” \f*
every goldsmith is ashamed by \add his\add* divine image,
for his cast image \add is\add* an illusion,
and \add there is\add* no breath in them.
They \add are\add* vanity, a work of mockery,
at the time of their punishment, they will perish.
The portion of Jacob \add is\add* not like these,
for he \add is\add* the creator of everything,
and Israel \add is\add* the tribe of his inheritance,
Yahweh of hosts \add is\add* his name.
Gather your bundle from \add the\add* ground,
you who live under the siege.’ ”
For thus says Yahweh,
“Look, I \add am\add* about to sling out the inhabitants of the land at this time,
and I will bring distress to them, so that they may feel it.”
The Nation Accepts Its Judgment
Woe to me, because of my wound.
My wound \add is\add* incurable.
But I said, “Surely this \add is my\add* sickness,
and I must bear it.”
My tent is devastated,
and all my tent cords are torn.
My children have gone out \add from\add* me,
and they are not.
There is no \add one who\add* pitches my tent again,
or \add one who\add* puts up my tent curtains.
For the shepherds have become stupid,
they do not seek Yahweh.
⸤Therefore⸥\f + \fr 10:21 \ft Literally “Unto thus” \f* they do not have insight,
and all of their flock are scattered.
Listen, news:\f + \fr 10:22 \ft Or “a report” \f*
Look, \add it is\add* coming,
a great roar from \add the\add* land of \add the\add* north,
to make the cities of Judah a desolation,
a lair of jackals.
I know, \add O\add* Yahweh, that to the human \add is\add* not his \add own\add* way,
nor to a person \add is the\add* walking and the directing of his \add own\add* step.
Chastise\f + \fr 10:24 \ft Or “Discipline” \f* me, \add O\add* Yahweh, but in moderation,
not in your anger, lest you eradicate me.
Pour out your wrath on the nations that do not know you,
and on \add the\add* peoples that do not call on your name,
for they have devoured Jacob,
they have devoured and consumed him,
and they have caused his settlement to be desolate.
